text:
FARAH'S HOLIDAY PICK - THROWS

"Throws add a cozy, warm and inviting feel to any room. The Inspire Me! Home Decor Pom Pom Metallic Knit is designed with a touch of glamour and style, yet looks cozy and is versatile thanks to its neutral colors! Makes for a special gift for your loved ones!"

Read Full Article
title: Christmas in July Is Here! 10 QVC Stars Share Their Holiday Gift Picks
